text:
Doctors say it's safe for #BreastCancer patients to get a #CovidVaccine, but remind them to get the vaccine on the opposite side of where they had #BreastCancer. Keep up w/your #mammogram, but allow time after or before the #mammogram & the #vaccine👇🏿

#bcsm
#covid19
